title: AI-Blended Instruction Program for Enhancing Adult English Learning Motivation and Achievement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: AI tool-integrated lessons using digital devices, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can set weekly goals and establish study plans using AI tools.
Learners incorporate writing feedback from an automated essay evaluation system at a rate of over 80%.
Learners can improve pronunciation accuracy by 30% using AI speech recognition tools.
Learners demonstrate practical English proficiency in real-world contexts through project-based assessments.
Learners can increase their learning motivation index by over 25% through self-efficacy surveys.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
